parameters.WebhookApprovalCreationInput/title: Request for budget sub-type project amendment decision @{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_name']}

parameters.WebhookApprovalCreationInput/details:
### The following has been submitted for Project Amendment Approval ###

Account Manager recommendation - @{if(triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_recommendation'],'Re-Approve','Decline')}

Project Amendment record in myHIE: [@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_name']}](@{outputs('Run_a_Child_Flow_-_Get_PA_URL')?['Body']?['entityurl']})

####  If the Date of decision was prior to today, please include the Date of Decision within the Notes field below ####

parameters.WebhookApprovalCreationInput/title: Request for cost type project amendment decision @{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_name']}
parameters.WebhookApprovalCreationInput/details:
### The following has been submitted for cost type Project Amendment Approval ###

Account Manager recommendation - @{if(triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_recommendation'],'Re-Approve','Decline')}

Project Amendment record in myHIE: [@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_name']}](@{outputs('Run_a_Child_Flow_-_Get_PA_URL')?['Body']?['entityurl']})

####  If the Date of decision was prior to today, please include the Date of Decision within the Notes field below ####

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_projectcost">
    <attribute name="leidos_projectcostid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_costitem" />
    <order attribute="leidos_costitem" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentproject" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/_leidos_project_value']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_anticipatedspendprofile">
    <attribute name="leidos_anticipatedspendprofileid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentproject" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/_leidos_project_value']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_projectcost">
    <attribute name="leidos_projectcostid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_costitem" />
    <order attribute="leidos_costitem" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentproject" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/_leidos_project_value']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_anticipatedspendprofile">
    <attribute name="leidos_anticipatedspendprofileid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentproject" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/_leidos_project_value']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

Update_Project_record_Approved_-_CT.description: By making the Project inactive the child Cost and Spend Profile records are updated to correct status as per flow 'Project - Flow Change of State to Inactive - Set Child to that State''

WebhookApprovalCreationInput/responseOpt: Approve Status change to Clear to pay
Reject Status change to Clear to pay
parameters.WebhookApprovalCreationInput/title: Request for cost type project amendment decision @{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_name']}

Approve_Clear_to_pay.case: Approve Status change to Clear to pay

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_spendprofiledetail">
    <attribute name="leidos_spendprofiledetailid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_name" />
    <order attribute="leidos_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentspendprofile" operator="eq" value="@{items('Loop_thru_Spend_Profile')?['leidos_anticipatedspendprofileid']}" />
      <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="eq" value="1" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_nonspendamount" operator="gt" value="0" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="leidos_anticipatedspendprofile">
    <attribute name="leidos_parentproject" />
    <attribute name="leidos_anticipatedspendprofileid" />
    <order attribute="leidos_parentproject" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentproject" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/_leidos_project_value']}" />
      <condition attribute="statuscode" operator="in">
        <value>1</value>
        <value>445260000</value>
      </condition>
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Project status change to Clear to Pay - Approved
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
The request to revert Project @{outputs('Get_Project_record_values')?['body/leidos_projectreference']} - @{outputs('Get_Project_record_values')?['body/leidos_name']} to status Clear to pay has been approved and actioned.

Comments: @{items('Approve_revert_to_clear_to_play')?['comments']}

Please reprofile spend profiles for the project and update the Date of Decision in the Project Amendment record.

Reject_Clear_to_pay.case: Reject Status change to Clear to pay

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: Project status change to Clear to Pay - Rejected
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
The request to revert Project @{outputs('Get_Project_record_values')?['body/leidos_projectreference']} - @{outputs('Get_Project_record_values')?['body/leidos_name']} to status Clear to pay has been rejected.
The Project's status has been reverted to Claims Complete.

Comments: @{items('Reject_revert_to_clear_to_pay')?['comments']}

Amendment_Type_set_Project_to_Awaiting_A.description: Do not set project status when amendment type = Revert to clear to pay
